metadata.title: CVE-2021-46237 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An untrusted pointer dereference vulnerability exists in GPAC v1.1.0 via the function gf_node_unregister () at scenegraph/base_scenegraph.c. This vulnerability can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
